name: Dell Technologies' Products Bug Bounty Program

in_scope.target: Actively Supported, Bounty Eligible Dell Products
Actively Supported, Non-Reward Eligible Dell Products
Source code of Website, Mobile, or Server Libraries (https://segment.com/docs/sources/)
Any host / web property verified to be owned by Segment (domains/IP space/etc.)

out_of_scope.target: Any asset not explicitly listed as 'In Scope' above is explicitly out of scope

in_scope.target: Bed Bath & Beyond by Overstock Mobile App
Bed Bath & Beyond by Overstock iOS Mobile App
Open source projects(non-forked) listed at github.com/pinterest/
SpaceX and Starlink assets (target information and rewards detailed above on the brief)
Insight Managed Smart Cloud Wireless Access Point

Other HubSpot-owned (sub)domains not listed as Out of Scope . Please make sure to exercise due diligence before testing. You must include proof that the subdomain is registered to HubSpot to be eligible for a reward.

out_of_scope.target: Anything that CNAMEs to a third party

in_scope.target: Okta On-Prem Agents ( AD, LDAP, RDP, IWA )

out_of_scope.target: AtSpoke - Okta Workflows actions in access requests
AtSpoke - Entitlement bundles as a resource in access requests
Anything not explicitly called out above as in-scope

in_scope.target: Any host/web property/mobile app verified to be owned by Indeed

out_of_scope.target: Any subdomain/domain/property not listed in the 'in scope' section, is out of scope.

in_scope.target: LastPass browser extensions (Chrome / Safari / Edge / Firefox)
Local computer apps (UWP application / Windows installer (MSI) / MacOS)
Any host verified to be owned by Tesla Motors Inc. (domains/IP space/etc.)
Tesla vehicle hardware that you own

out_of_scope.target: energysupport.tesla.com (you can report vulnerabilities to bugbounty.zoho.com)
Any domains from acquisitions, such as maxwell.com
Any other third-party websites hosted by non-Tesla entities

in_scope.target: Insight Managed Smart Cloud Wireless Access Point

out_of_scope.target: Live production instance of WHMCS (Any instances not owned by you)

in_scope.target: All IT-Managed Third-Party Services and Infrastructure
Keeper Browser Extension (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge)
Keeper Desktop App for Mac, PC, Linux
Keeper Web Vault (US, EU, AU, CA, JP, GovCloud)
Keeper Admin Console (US, EU, AU, CA, JP, GovCloud)
SSO Connect Cloud and Automator Service
Any S3 buckets you can find
SEEK Pass Mobile App for iOS
SEEK Pass Mobile App for Android
Any publicly facing asset owned by HealthifyMe (ip space, domains, etc)

out_of_scope.target: Anything not explicitly listed in scope.

in_scope.target: Vulnerabilities compromising the privacy of our employees
